mintonetteCup.title:
Montpellier hosts the Mintonette Cup, the world volleyball tournament that brings together the best players!
Change the image (wrong colors)

burgerStand.title: Burger Stand
burgerStand.description:
Good news! The burger stand will indeed be present at the Mintonette Cup.
You will find a wide selection to satisfy all cravings: tasty classic burgers,
more indulgent recipes, as well as vegetarian options so that everyone can enjoy.

Whether you are a meat lover or prefer lighter alternatives, everyone will be warmly welcomed. Itâ€™s the perfect opportunity to share a convivial moment over a good meal while enjoying the event!
